Body:
cron = doccron.cron('0 0 21W * 6 *')
datetime_21 = datetime.now(tz=tzlocal()).replace(hour=0, minute=0, second=0,
    microsecond=0)
if datetime_21.day == 21:
    datetime_21 += timedelta(days=monthrange(datetime_21.year, datetime_21.
        month)[-1])
while True:
    if datetime_21.day == 21 and datetime_21.isoweekday() == 6:
        break
    datetime_21 += timedelta(days=1)
assert next(cron) == datetime_21 - timedelta(days=1)
